title: Handle a Repair Order
description: A mechanic needs to perform a repair on a truck, documenting parts used and labor hours.

tasks.description: Select a repair order from the queue in the maintenance system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Mechanic retrieves the work order for a specific truck.

tasks.description: After diagnosing the issue, add the required parts from inventory to the repair order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system deducts the parts from inventory and adds them to the order.

tasks.description: Log the labor hours spent on the repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Labor time is correctly added to the order.

tasks.description: Mark the repair order as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The repair is finished, and the truck's status is updated to 'Available'.
